title: Game Freezes on Game Load after 4.19 patch
body: Having issues since 4.19 patch.  After character select during the loading screen the game freezes.  This has never happened before but happens every time now.  The % of load is all over the board from 10% to 90%.  I have to kill the game client and restart.  I get in after that but the game has already started and I'm behind a minute or so.  Not a big deal, just annoying.

replies.body:
here you go.

looking at that log there is a whole bunch of "error". lol
Thanks, I also forwarded your logs to engineering. The issue should be fixed after the latest patch.

Hey everyone,

We're currently investigating this issue with our Game Engineers, but we would like to ask you for your R3d Logs.

If you can, please provide us the logs from the matches where you  suffered from this issue (please be mindful to only provide those from the matches where this issue happened, and only provide them if you have really bumped into this problem, as false positives will only make our  investigation more difficult).

Each file appears like this: [yyyy-mm-ddT15-40-03] _r3dlog.txt, where yyyy-mm-dd is the date of the match played.

You can find them here:

X:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs (where X: is the drive where you installed League of Legends, which normally is C: )

Then when you have the log file, please upload with a post here, and  I'll make sure to provide them to our people who are looking into this issue.

Thanks in advance.

Here is the log files from everything in that folder from today.  It happened in all the games so I took the .txt files and archived them to a .rar.  I renamed the RAR file to a TXT file so I could upload it.  They'll have to rename the file back to .rar to extract.  Thanks!
Thanks for the logs, they were forwarded to engineering {{champion:74}} . A fix has been deployed, so hopefully you no longer see this issue!
Freeze at loading screen and get banned by leaverbuster, what the fuck is wrong with you
I need a solution I click on league and it just gives the league logo and it wont give me the league screen to launch
My game is saying that a firewall may be preventing it from connecting to the servers after champ select never had this problem before any idea how to fix it?
I had the same issue client is freezing until it either loads in or I kill the process.
